description.value:
You create a rapid flow of water beneath a creature’s feet, carrying them in a single direction you wish. An unwilling creature needs to make a Fortitude saving throw, while a willing creature can choose to take the failure or critical failure effect. Casting this spell with 2 actions creates a single 5-foot wide line that can move a single creature from the origin point of the spell, while casting this spell with 3 actions creates a 15-foot wide line that can affect three adjacent creatures who are side by side.

 

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature moves 5 feet.

Failure The creature moves 5 to 10 feet (your choice).

Critical Failure The creature moves 5 to 15 feet (your choice).

 

Heightened(5th) The width of the line increases by 10 feet, and the maximum distance you can move a creature on a success, failure or critical failure increases by 10 feet.

Heightened(8th) The width of the line increases by 20 feet, and the maximum distance you can move a creature on a success, failure or critical failure increases by 20 feet.
